name: AccountDropdown
description: This component provides a common interface for choosing an account with a callback (onSelect allows for integration in to the rest of your application).

props.name: onSelect
props.description: A callback giving you access to the Account (object) selected by the User

props.name: onError
props.description: A callback giving you access to the any errors occurring during account-fetching

props.name: label
props.description: The text that appears in the label element above the dropdown
